motivating-advice.advice: Sometimes silence is full of answers.
The sky is not the limit, your mind is it.
If you weren 'thappy with your life yesterday, try something new today.
Life is not about waiting the storm to pass, it is about learning to dance in the rain.
Every journey begins with one small step.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Happyness consists in giving and sharing.
you can't be bitter and expect life to be sweet.
Winners are not people that never fail, but people who never quit.
